channel.title: plot on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in plot on A Hugo website

item.title: Get me to the Beer
item.description: At some point during the lockdown it was announced that we could meet in groups of no more than 8 in an outdoor setting. This meant that we would need to have knowledge of where we could meet our friends for the first time in an age. I’m sure we know of our local and well frequented boozers; but what about those that have outdoor seating? How would we know where to meet our friends?

item.title: Mapping NHS Vaccine Centres
item.description: The NHS website does not display vaccine centres on a map. How can I know what centres are near me? Answer: scrape the centres and display them all. This does require you to know where you are on a map, but for now, it’s much nicer to visualise.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
